text:
Today's lesson, in addition to helping 
you master a lot of useful vocabulary

and fluent pronunciation, we'll help you to 
overcome your fear of speaking English. And

if you are new here, every week we bring 
you new lessons to help you to understand

fast native speech without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without

subtitles. Like Siti who says that now he really 
can understand the humor. We're here to help you

to reach your English learning goals too, but we 
can only do that if you hit the subscribe button

and the bell down below so that 
you don't miss our new lessons.

Is it important for you to be able to understand 
natives just like we speak in real life without

getting lost or missing the meaning? Well, a 
great way to practice is by listening to podcasts.

And you can listen to the full interview with 
Veronika and other teachers and experts for FREE

anywhere you enjoy podcasts. However what I 
would recommend is that you download the free

RealLife English app and listen there. 
Why? Because it is the only place

where you can get full transcripts for the 
episodes and definitions of the vocabulary.

This will help you to train your ears to 
understand natives even at fast speeds.

And that's not all, you will also improve your 
speaking and overcome your fear because this

is the only place that by simply touching a 
button you can practice your English anytime,

anywhere, in a safe and supportive environment. 
Plus, you will discover new cultures and make

English-speaking friends. I bet this all sounds 
like a dream come true, right? Well, now with the

RealLife English App it is true. So download 
the app for free by searching for RealLife

English in the Apple App or Google Play Store 
or just click here or in the description below.

One of the things Veronika most attributes 
her English learning success to is attending

English-speaking clubs. This is not the first 
time I've heard a fluent English speaker say this.

Have you ever attended an event where you could 
practice your English with fellow learners?

Take a moment and share your experience and 
how you found it with your fellow learners.

You could really help someone 
to improve their speaking.

Veronika is setting a great example for you on 
how to not give up to overcome your shyness and

to speak confidently. I highly recommend that 
you check out and subscribe to her channel which

we've linked down in the description. And if 
you want even more Veronika, then be sure to

listen to the full interview or watch another 
video we've made with her over on our RealLife

English channel, where you can learn her rules 
for fluency. Let's watch a clip from that.
